content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x3) with coal inserted

### Iron plate extraction setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron plates extracted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron plates extracted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory status to ensure you are aware of the resources available for crafting and inserting into machines.
